---
title: "STA 101L: Data Analysis and Statistical Inference"
---

Learn approaches for analyzing quantitative data, emphasizing regression models, and statistical inference. Learn techniques for visualizing numerical and categorical data, building a forecasting model, and modeling real-world phenomena. Gain experience dealing with the challenges that arise in practice through hands-on assignments and projects that utilize real-world data. This class emphasizes data analysis over mathematical theory and has no prerequisite.

Did you know that statistics was first used in agriculture and that data science has probably revolutionized your favorite sport? Check out these [slides](slides/applications.html) to learn more about the impact that statistics and data sciences have had on various fields through short videos.
